product.name: Yescom Clear Office Chair Mat for Hardwood 48" x 36" with Lip Plastic Floor Protector for Rolling Desk Chairs Home Studio
product.description:
Yescom is a company focused on passion; yours and ours! We strive to bring passion to our work and we do so. We continue to pride ourselves on our capability of being "One Step Ahead of Your Needs.
This PVC floor mat is 1.5 mm thick, durable and wear-resistant; Transparent design clearly displays the floor underneath while matching well with different hardwood floors
To unroll the mat and lay it flat, it is recommended that the chair mat is placed on a smoot flat surface outside in the sun to warm it up until it flattens.
Non-slip matte surface is easy to glide and can reduce leg fatigue.
Please note that this chair mat is not suitable for use on carpets, and it is designed for hard floors only.
48" x 36" Rectangle Chair Mat
48" x 36" Chair Mat with Lip
60" x 46" Rectangle Chair Mat

product.bullet_points:
• [Protect Hardwood Floor]: 47 1/4" x 35 7/16" x 1/16" Rectangle office chair mat with lip protects your hardwood floor from friction and scratches caused by chair casters and avoids slipping; transparent design for displaying your floor pattern clearly and matching to different hardwood floors
• [Slip Resistance]: Feature non-slip frosted surface on the upper side for providing extra traction between the wheels and chair mats and preventing the chair from slipping, while smooth surface on the bottom sticks to the floor tightly and stays in place firmly.Please note that to unroll the mat and lay it flat, it is recommended that the chair mat is placed on a smoot flat surface outside in the sun to warm it up until it flattens.
• [Safety & Durability]: Made of PVC material which is not including harmful chemical, the chair mat is safe to use in any workplace; Features premium resistance to wear and tear for ensuring a longer service life
• [Easy Maintenance]: Thanks to its water-repellent property, the dirt and dust can be quickly wiped off the surface of the chair mat for easy cleaning; Rollable design for space-saving storage when not in use
• [Versatile Applications]: The chair mat is suitable for hardwood floors, and also provides multi-purpose usages for homes, offices, and studios as a computer chair mat, table mat, pet house mat, and more
